Articles.Content: Is there any mod that has the capability to limit angle of attack in manual flight? I need this for my negative stability test planes, and it would greatly help me pilot barely stable planes like the Su-35 when I don't want to do Kobras.
FAR has one built in, perhaps AtmosphereAutopilot which does an awful lot more.

Well crap. I don't want to use FAR because it sucks IMO, because it has extreme performance hit, may cause kraken attacks on DMP, and because it requires module manager. The last of the reasons is why I'm probably not going to use AtmosphereAutopilot either. I'll try installing it, but although most part-adding mods that "require" MM work without it (sometimes with a few missing animations or other useless crap, but always way less buggy and crashy), most MM "requiring" autopilots do indeed need it to work.
